```
  :####:   ########   .####.   ######:
 :######   ########   ######   #######:
 ##:  :#      ##     :##  ##:  ##   :##
 ##           ##     ##:  :##  ##    ##
 ###:         ##     ##    ##  ##   :##
 :#####:      ##     ##    ##  #######:
  .#####:     ##     ##    ##  ######:
     :###     ##     ##    ##  ##
       ##     ##     ##:  :##  ##
 #:.  :##     ##     :##  ##:  ##
 #######:     ##      ######   ##
 .#####:      ##      .####.   ##
```

This repository has been abandoned.
The project lives on at https://github.com/PHPCSStandards/PHP_CodeSniffer
See https://github.com/squizlabs/PHP_CodeSniffer/issues/3932 for more information.
